messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

security roll out roll out hi guys having again issues with computer hosting locally few web applications when try open them get almost response please check attached screen grabs you can there minutes waiting load files requests ends up with status code gateway timeout error haven installed any gateways or something tried restart result same capture noticed such issues started appear next after thing was deployed machine can get touch with someone can disable or order test if giving trouble thank you software consultant sent december roll out importance high dear colleagues starting year embarked journey adopt best class technical response ever growing demand regards information after extensive preparation we re ready start phase wide there be gradual require your help understanding please bear with part programme we replace our current solution with anti end client amp during following days or your laptop join corporate case you were away installation automatically start background with interaction required however prompt you restart your computer complete process you be able postpone restart more convenient but please delay more than avoid forced restart eventually be performed make remain protected times order make transition smooth possible amp be running parallel with mode until old solution be decommissioned by end month there should be impact or visible change your station however please report any problem should you notice any strange behavior please watch space for future announcements additional be introduced following months always our teams myself here pick up any questions or concerns best regards manager

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT Ticket**

I need to categorize an IT ticket that the user provided. It looks like a security rollout message detailing issues like gateway timeouts, web app loading problems, and some attached screen grabs. The ticket talks about "security rollout issues" and mentions an "anti-end client." It seems most relevant to either "Internal Project" due to the rollout aspect or "Administrative Rights" if adjustments to access are needed. Let's pick the most fitting category.**Finalizing Category Selection**

The ticket mentions "disable or order test if giving trouble," which is a bit unclear. Considering the options, “Internal Project” feels right for a rollout and deployment. While “Access” could apply due to gateway timeout issues, it seems more aligned with deployment. So, I’ll categorize it as “Internal Project.” I need to respond in JSON format as specified. The output will just be: {"category":"Internal Project"}. No extra text is necessary!**Confirming Category Fit**

I want to make sure I have the right category here. The content indeed talks about a rollout of security software with phrases like "phase wide" and requests for understanding during the process. This clearly points to it being an internal project. So, it’s settled: I’ll finalize it as {"category":"Internal Project"}. Now I just need to provide that as my response.
